# Unit 1: Statistical Simulations (weeks 1-3)

## Week 1 {.tabset}

### Wed Aug 21

* Entrance ticket ET_001 [Canvas](https://bart.instructure.com/courses/1314/quizzes/2254)/[public](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/ET/ET_001.html)
* Review the [syllabus](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/syllabus_a2.html).
* [First day survey](https://forms.gle/UiZrKtkPGFZ7Po8F9)
* Students will participate in a survey. We discuss some of the questions together.
* *S-IC.B: Make inferences and justify conclusions from sample surveys, experiments, and observational studies.*

### Thu Aug 22

* Entrance ticket ET_002 [Canvas](https://bart.instructure.com/courses/1314/quizzes/2255)/[public](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/ET/ET_002.html)
* Define population, parameter, sample, and statistic.
* Discuss how the goal of Statistics is to estimate population parameters from sample statistics.
* [Slides](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/u01/p01_sam_stat_pop_prop.html)
* Graded problem: u01_01_sam_stat_pop_param [Canvas](https://bart.instructure.com/courses/1314/quizzes/2212)/[public](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/u01/outhtml/01_sam_stat_pop_param.html)
* Assignment: Write 12 research questions (Due Monday Aug 26) [Canvas](https://bart.instructure.com/courses/1314/assignments/21622)/[public](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/u01/asn_research_questions.html)
* *S-IC.A.1: Understand statistics as a process for making inferences to be made about population parameters based on a random sample from that population.*

### Fri Aug 23

* Entrance ticket ET_003 [Canvas](https://bart.instructure.com/courses/1314/quizzes/2256)/[public](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/ET/ET_003.html)
* Define survey, experiment, and observational study. We discuss the importance of random samples and random assignment.
* [Slides](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/u01/p02_survey_experi_obsstu.html)
* Graded problems:
  * 02_survey_experi_obsstu [Canvas](https://bart.instructure.com/courses/1314/quizzes/2213)/[public](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/u01/outhtml/02_survey_experi_obsstu.html)
  * 03_sample_bias [Canvas](https://bart.instructure.com/courses/1314/quizzes/2214)/[public](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/u01/outhtml/03_sample_bias.html)
  * 04_corr_or_cause [Canvas](https://bart.instructure.com/courses/1314/quizzes/2229)/[public](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/u01/outhtml/04_corr_or_cause.html)
* Reminder of assignment: Write 12 research questions (Due Monday Aug 26) [Canvas](https://bart.instructure.com/courses/1314/assignments/21622)/[public](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/u01/asn_research_questions.html)
* *S-IC.B.3: Recognize the purposes of and differences among sample surveys, experiments, and observational studies; explain how randomization relates to each.*
